titleStmt.title: The vvarres of Cyrus King of Persia, against Antiochus King of Assyria with the tragicall ende of Panthæa. Played by the children of her Maiesties Chappell.
titleStmt.author: Farrant, Richard, d. 1580, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[dward] A[llde] for William Blackwal, and are to be sold at his shop ouer against Guild-hall gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop ouer against Guild-hall gate
